Tonight we had an amazing dining experience at Menegrina.  We got to speak with Arianna, who is the owner, and she guided us through the menu and the decor.  The interior is very beautiful, all painted white, and where there were holes in the original stones, old cups, plates, and figurines have been placed.  The whole interior to the menu is very inspirational and artistic.  The house red wine was from a small winery in Rioja and was done in small batches, the proprietor didn't even make labels for the wine.  We shared a plate of Italian cheeses which was excellent.  My wife had the handmade gnocchi and I had the rabbit with polenta.  Both dishes were spectacular and very creative.   Their desserts were fantastic as well.  This was our date night in Barcelona and it was one well-spent.  We will be going back and telling our friends.  If you want Italian cuisine with a Catalan flair, this is your place!The fresh pasta with blue fish is fantastic as is the ragu.  You must eat here!
